term: black codes + effects on black ppl
content:
when ex-confed gov people - eg former generals, governors, etc. of confed states - holding office positions in union and being able to pass bills

ex-confeds > get positions in govnt > have power in union gov > able to pass shit that THEY want

blacks became:
	unable to hold meetings unless whites were present
	couldn't travel w/o permit
	couldn't hold arms
	(some towns) forbid freedmen from living in towns
	prevented from running land or borrowing money to buy land

what emerges is a contract-labor system
